name: Rise (New State)
description:
Leap through a charming and minimalist floating world in this first-person platformer. Face-off against the environment and fanciful adversaries using casual gameplay mechanics.

Enjoy an inspiring soundtrack throughout all of the action.
Solve and overcome challenges in a variety of levels. 
Survive an onslaught of outlandish enemies in the increasingly difficult Ascend mode.
Master agility, perfect timing, exploit physics and collect rewards.
